title: Current in circuit with two voltage sources

content.question: What are the value and the direction of the current through the 5 Î© resistor in the circuit shown above?

choices.label: 1.0 A toward the top of the page
1.0 A toward the bottom of the page
2.0 A toward the top of the page
2.0 A toward the bottom of the page

content.answer: 1.0 A toward the bottom of the page

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
